snippet: The Red Storm dropped their Big East Conference opener on Thursday. Still Mullin, the St. John’s basketball legend turned first-year coach, sees signs of improvement.
abstract: Creighton men's college basketball team defeats St John's, 80-70, in their Big East Conference opener.
lead_paragraph: The Red Storm dropped their Big East Conference opener on Thursday. Still Mullin, the St. John’s basketball legend turned first-year coach, sees signs of improvement.

headline.print_headline: Mullin Sees Mixed Signs in St. John’s Loss
headline.main: Chris Mullin Sees Mixed Signs in St. John’s Loss
